entry.p: CLKOUT_SRC_P/N. Note: DMI CLK can be mapped to any CLKOUT_SRC.
Clock signals require 0.76 mm isolation to adjacent high speed IOs. Isolation to other differential clocks, USB2 and low-speed IOs can be maintained at 0.5 mm.

[1] For signal sections of the signals which are routed on MS (surface) layer, a GND ring/ shield is advised to be added (with similar guidelines following a standard GND ring/shield such as for XTAL) with sufficient GND stitching vias for the length of the MS routed layer.
[2] GND ring/ shield GND stitching vias should be placed at regular intervals of 4 - 12 mm.
[3] It is advised to route the clock signals in inner layer SL/ DSL routing. Limit MS routed section and follow above shielding guidelines.
